attributes.action: Refuse to allow iGCSE examinations to take place.
attributes.additional_details: By allowing these exams to continue to take place, you create an unfair inconsistency between state and private schools. There should be consistency across the examination period for Schools, for the sake of the children and public health, amidst the Corona virus.
attributes.background: Stop the iGCSE examinations from continuing to take place and enforce a measure similar to the standard GCSEs.

rejection.details:
Decisions about courses and assessments that are delivered by independent educational institutions, as opposed to state schools, are a matter for individual exam boards and educational institutions, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Prohibit any exams from taking place during the Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570228
